name: JardInIAir
description:
Jard, a gardening store employee, needs to run across the platforms of the warehouse to gather the customers' orders as fast as possible. Once it is done, he has to send the orders to the customers with a cannon to fulfill his mission and get paid. However, be careful not to be too slow or it will be bankruptcy for you!

---------------------------------------------

Created during the 2023 Global Game Jam
